data.introduce: 该接口用于外航自动改期使用，对应原黑屏RVAL指令。
data.business: 外航自动改期。票面航段状态目前支持OPEN FOR USE和AIRPORT/CNTL状态下改期。 每次改期只能修改一人一段。
data.functions: 该接口用于外航自动改期使用，接口返回改期成功后，建议先提取记录，核对记录中是否有新航段SSR TKNE 项写入，再提取票面核对票面需要改期的航段是否是更改后的新航段。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirRevalidationRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"外航自动改期","children":[{"name":"RVALRequest","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Query","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"CouponID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"couponID","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerIndex","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客序号","children":[]},{"name":"TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"RecordLocator","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Pnr号","children":[]},{"name":"SegmentInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"DepartureDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"起飞时间","children":[]},{"name":"ActionCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行动码","children":[]},{"name":"ArrivalCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达城市","children":[]},{"name":"DepartureCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"始发城市","children":[]},{"name":"CabinType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位","children":[]},{"name":"FlightSuffix","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号后缀","children":[]},{"name":"FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]},{"name":"AirlineID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirRevalidationRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"外航自动改期","children":[{"name":"Success","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[]}]}]}]}]
